works.complaint:
January 20, 2912

Dear Sirs,

This complaint relates to defamation of character, as per statements made  
within a forum site, which has been made public by way of Google’s posting  
of the following named forum site, on its search pages.

In offering a brief background on this matter, the owner of the site, Eric  
Bridgen had been a member of our forum, “The Canadian Gold Prospectors  
Forum” URL http://gpex.ca/smf/index.php from which he was banned on  
December 12, 2011, for grotesque content he placed within a post. This was  
by far not the first time he partook in such unacceptable behavior and was  
repetitively cautioned about his actions.  Nevertheless, Bridgen has  
subsequently made various threats, which were taken to be in target of our  
Forum, which in only summarizing things, as of January 1, 2012, he started  
his own forum, The Gold Prospectors Forum, (URL
